creator: gerry@pathtech.org
text:
Found spelling errors  in manager-howto.html. Look for "mnagement"
I would also like to comment on the use of "context" in this document. I may be
clear to the experienced or expert programmer what this term means. I found it
difficult to fully understand. Perhaps a short explanation is in order for the
unwashed.

I don't think it's fair to expect the Tomcat to be anything but a reference 
documentation, esp since it's written solely by the developers (that means 
Craig here, since I've been carefully avoiding doing my part).

As long as content is not wrong or too obviously incomplete, I don't think we 
should accept general comments on quality of the documentation as bugs (except, 
of course, if there are patches attached to the bug ;-)).
creator: remm@apache.org
